summary: Implements a comprehensive diffusion pipeline for music and audio generation, coordinating pretrained audio autoencoders, UNet denoisers, CLAP text‑audio encoders, tokenizers, and diffusion schedulers to produce sound conditioned on textual prompts and optional reference audio.
business_intent: Provides developers and content creators with a ready‑to‑use tool for generating high‑quality music or sound effects from natural language descriptions, supporting applications in media production, game audio, advertising, and AI‑driven creative workflows.
